evidence.claim: Configure8 uses AWS services for serverless architecture and data storage.
The company highlights its commitment to HIPAA compliance for healthcare integrations.
They employ FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration patterns include leveraging REST APIs for third-party EHR systems.
Cloud infrastructure includes usage of Google Cloud Platform for data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling EDI transactions or X12 use cases found.
